contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=July 2009}} '''Obra''' is a [[river]] in west [[Poland]], a tributary of the [[Warta]] river (in [[Skwierzyna]]), with a length of 164 kilometres (27th longest) and the basin area of 2,758 km<sup>2</sup>. The river is popular with [[canoe]] and [[kayak]] enthusiasts and an established canoe trail exists. == Towns == * [[Krzywiń]] * [[Kościan]] * [[Kargowa]] * [[Trzciel]] * [[Międzyrzecz]] * [[Skwierzyna]] ==See also== * [[Rivers of Poland]] {{coord|52.6024|N|15.4789|E|source:kolossus-dewiki|display=title}} [[Category:Rivers of Poland]] [[Category:Geography of Lubusz Voivodeship]] [[Category:Rivers of Greater Poland Voivodeship]] {{Lubusz-geo-stub}} {{GreaterPoland-geo-stub}} {{Polish rivers}}
